headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to communicate with Legrand LC7001. (RFLC, Adorne, and On-Q)
footerDisplay: Configure your LC7001 using the Legrand Lighting Control app. The names you give your light switches and dimmers are treated as unique indentifiers. If you rename any object in the Legrand Lighting Control app, the accessory will be removed from HomeKit and re-added under the new name. You can rename the lights as much as you want within HomeKit, just not within the Legrand Lighting Control app.

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as it will appear in logs.

lc7001-password.title: Password
lc7001-password.description: Password assigned to LC7001 via the Legrand Lighting Control app. (Pre-2020 configurations may not have a password.)

lc7001-hostname.title: Hostname
lc7001-hostname.description: Hostname/IP address of LC7001 device. The default ("LCM1.local") is an mDNS hostname the LC7001 device will answer.

lc7001-port.title: Port
lc7001-port.description: TCP port of LC7001 device. Default is 2112.

lc7001-localaddress.title: Source IP Address
lc7001-localaddress.description: Source IP address from which to contact LC7001.

lc7001-localport.title: Source TCP Port
lc7001-localport.description: Source TCP port from which to contact LC7001.

lc7001-family.title: IP Version
lc7001-family.description: IP version with which to contact LC7001.

lc7001-delimiter.title: JSON Delimiter
lc7001-delimiter.description: Delimiter LC7001 uses to separate JSON objects. Default is null character. (Escape strings will need to be manually configured.)

logBroadcastDiagnostics.title: Log LC7001 BroadcastDiagnostics messages?
logBroadcastDiagnostics.description: Enable to log LC7001 debug messages.

logBroadcastMemory.title: Log LC7001 BroadcastMemory messages?
logBroadcastMemory.description: Enable to log LC7001 debug messages.

logDebugMessages.title: Log LC7001 debug messages?
logDebugMessages.description: Enable to log LC7001 debug messages.

useOldUUID.title: Use old UUID generation key?
useOldUUID.description: Enable to generate UUIDs using method prior to version 1.0.
